WorkItem.ClosedComment: set map properties in forms constructor
WorkItem.Description:
Hi, i'm implementing the control in an form, all's looks great, but all maps show in left half of control only.

Code:

   With geoMapa
            .SetCurrentPositionByKeywords("USA")
            .MapProvider = GMap.NET.MapProviders.GMapProviders.GoogleMap
            .MinZoom = 3
            .MaxZoom = 17
            .Zoom = 4
            .Manager.Mode = AccessMode.ServerAndCache
        End With

Anybody know something?
